alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 4:28PM MDT until June 21 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern El Paso County in east central Colorado... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 428 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Air Force Academy, or 7 miles north of Colorado Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Northern Colorado Springs, Air Force Academy, Gleneagle and Cimarron Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
